text: Ikiavɨra Itir God na mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ mangɨ nguibar ekiamɨn dɨvazimɨn tiar akar me kamaghɨn dɨborim, Gumazamizibar Tiarakam, nɨ an boroghɨn tughɨv ikɨ. Kar Judan atrivibar nguibar ekiamɨn aven mangɨgh izegh gamir tiar akam. Egh nɨ gɨn anetegh mangɨ Jerusalemɨn tiar akar igharaziba uaghan bar dar boroghɨn tughɨv ikɨ.
